CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK( Commencement_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Concurrent_Operations_End_Date__c ), ISBLANK( HP_Reference_date__c ), ISBLANK( Actual_Date__c ) ), NULL, DATE(1900, 01, 01) + MAX( BLANKVALUE( Commencement_Date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE( Concurrent_Operations_End_Date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE( HP_Reference_date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01), BLANKVALUE( Actual_Date__c , DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) - DATE(1900, 01, 01) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Latest date of commencement, concurrent Ops, HP Reference or Actual Off 600 MHz. Used for Escalated Station Flow.
CustomField.label: Tracking Date LP
